title: Is radiologic physics a hard class? My girlfriend is considering getting a degree in radiography to be a radiology technician. - Quora

response.answer_text: I thought it was. It was a lot of information I had no interest in and that made it difficult for me…but I got through it with the help of a tutor. FYI I believe they have eliminated all x-ray called ”technicians “ because they typically had a limited license. We are called technologists because a degree is required for full body xray.Each modality requires a state license.

Actually, it isn’t really hard. Essentially, you would have had to take basic physics before taking radiography courses. This course only teaches the physics that applies specifically to the business.
